devdoc.author: Alexander Schlindwein
devdoc.details: Manages DAI investments into Compound. Sits behind a proxy

accrueInterest().details: Updates accrued interest on the invested Dai

donateInterest(uint256).details: Accepts donated Dai and invests into Compound to generate interest

params.amount: The amount of Dai to donate

getExchangeRate().details: Returns the exchange rate cDai -> Dai

params.compRecipient: The address of the recipient of the Comp tokens

invest(uint256).details: Invests a given amount of Dai into Compound

params.amount: The amount of Dai to invest

redeem(address,uint256).details: Checks that the caller is the owner and delegates to redeemInternal

redeemDonated(uint256).details: Redeems donated Dai back to the donator without generated interest

params.amount: The amount of Dai to redeem

redeemInvestmentToken(address,uint256).details: Redeem a given amount of cDai from Compound and sends Dai to the recipient

params.amount: The amount of cDai to redeem
params.recipient: The recipient of the redeemed Dai

withdrawComp().details: Withdraws the generated Comp tokens to the Comp recipient
